item.title: CSS - SASS handle index
item.description: CSS - SASS handle index Can use var control z-index $elements: con, slider, masthead; .masthead { /* z-index: 3 */ z-index: index($elements, masthead); } .slider { /* z-index: 2 */ z-index: index($elements, slider); } .con { /* z-index: 1 */ z-index: index($elements, con); } Refer - 使用 sass 有效控管 z-index 圖層順序
